gen_forward = train_gan(4.0, 1.25, epochs=1000, seed=42)
z = np.random.normal(0, 1, (500, 1))
x_gen, _, _ = gen_forward(z)
print((round(np.mean(x_gen), 4), round(np.std(x_gen), 4)))

gen_forward = train_gan(0.0, 1.0, epochs=500, seed=0)
z = np.random.normal(0, 1, (300, 1))
x_gen, _, _ = gen_forward(z)
print((round(np.mean(x_gen), 4), round(np.std(x_gen), 4)))

gen_forward = train_gan(-2.0, 0.5, epochs=1500, seed=123)
